news.title: AGenCy Lab Meetup
news.description: We had the CCDS / AGenCy lab's big meetup today. The new faculty members Dr. M M Mahbubul Sayeed,  Dr. Asm Shihavuddin and Dr. Saadia Binte Alam who joined IUB this year, the current faculty members - Prof Arshad Momen, Prof Ashraful Amin, Dr. Amin Ahsan Ali and Dr. AKM Mahbubur Rahman,  the outgoing RAs, the new RAs, and the undergrads who are doing their senior project with us we present. We had a special session conducted by our outgoing RAs who received PhD admission with RAships/fellowships sharing their research experience and journey towards PhD admission. Special thanks to Amit Roy, Kashob Roy , Saif Mahmud Dhrubo and Tanjid Hasan Tonmoy, Fahim Faisal Niloy for sharing their phd admission experience.

news.title: Rehab team visits CRP
news.description: Our Rehab team has a successful meeting with the CRP physiotherapy team at Savar, Dhaka. Rehab team has shown demonstration for wearable sensors and  Kinect sensors to track limb movements

news.title: Paper accepted at IEEE ICIP 2021
news.description: Our paper 'Attention Toward Neighbors: A Context Aware Framework for High Resolution Image Segmentation', has been accepted in IEEE ICIP 2021. Congratulations to Niloy.

news.title: Presentation on semi-supervised variational interface
news.description: We have an online presentation and discussion on semi-supervised variational inference at 22:30 through Google Meet platform.

news.title: Paper accepted at IJCNN 2021
news.description: Our paper 'Structure-Aware Hierarchical Graph Pooling using Information Bottleneck', has been accepted in IJCNN 2021 (Core Rank: A). Congratulations to Kashob and Amit.

news.title: Paper accepted at IJCNN 2021
news.description: Our paper 'Node Embedding using Mutual Information and Self-Supervision based Bi-level Aggregation', has been accepted in IJCNN 2021 (Core Rank: A). Congratulations to Kashob and Amit.

news.title: Paper accepted at PAKDD 2021
news.description: Our Human Activity Recognition paper 'Hierarchical Self Attention Based Autoencoder for Open-Set Human Activity Recognition', has been accepted in PAKDD 2021 (Core Rank: A). Congratulations to Saif and Tanjid.

We have an online presentation and discussion on variational inference at 22:30 through Google Meet platform.We have an online presentation and discussion on variational inference at 22:30 through Google Meet platform.

Our Traffic Forecasting paper 'SST-GNN: Simplified Spatio-temporal Traffic forecasting model using Graph Neural Network', has been accepted in 25th Pacific-Asia Conference on Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining (PAKDD-2021)(Core Rank: A). Congratulations to Amit and Kashob.

Our paper 'Deep-learning coupled with novel categorization method to classify the urban environment of the developing world' using deep learning method on satellite images has been accepted in 2nd International Conference on Signal Processing and Machine Learning (SIGML 2021). This paper has been written in collaboration with Data and Design Lab, Bangladesh and Center for Spatial Information Science, University of Tokyo, Japan.

Our Disaster Image paper 'A Novel Disaster Image Data-set and Characteristics Analysis using Attention Model' has been accepted in 25th International Conference on Pattern Recognition, 2020 (Core ranking: B). Congratulations to Fahim and Arif.

Our Traffic Modeling paper 'Modeling Traffic Congestion in Developing Countries using Google Map Data', has been accepted in Future of Information and Communication Conference (FICC) 2021, Springer. Congratulations to Akhtaruzzaman and Mahbub.

A journal paper 'Visual Attention Based Comparative Study on Disaster Detection from Social Media Images', has been accepted in Innovations in Systems and Software Engineering, 2020 (Q3 journal). Congratulations to Arif.

Our paper 'Robust Modeling of Epistemic Mental States' has been accepted in special Issue: Socio-Affective Technology, Journal of Multimedia Tools and Applications, 2020 (Q1 journal ).
EID Mubarak to all. Please stay home be safe.
As per the Government directives; the University will remain closed until 30th May 2020. Please stay home be safe.

We have a online paper presentation session at 11:00 PM via Google Hangouts. Saif and Tanjid will present on 'T-CVAE: Transformer-Based Conditioned Variational Autoencoder for Story Completion' and related papers
We have a online paper presentation session at 11:00 PM via Google Hangouts. Amit and Kashob will present on 'Hierarchical Graph Convolutional Networks: DiffPool, SAGPool, GSSNN' and related papers.

Three papers on data scientific work on Bangladesh (complex network analysis of waterway networks, and examining the correlation between socioeconomic indicators and night-time light data from satellites) have been accepted in IEEE Region 10 Symposium (TENSYMP), Dhaka, 2020.
